titles.title: To extend the temporary suspension of duty on mixtures of methyl 2-YYYYY4-(dimethylamino)-6-(2,2,2-trifluoroethoxy)-1,3,5-tri zin-2-yl?-amino?carbonyl?amino?sulfonyl?-3-methylbenzoate and application adjuvants.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

bill.summary: 12/17/2007--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend the temporary suspension of duty on mixtures of methyl 2-YYYYY4-(dimethylamino)-6-(2,2,2-trifluoroethoxy)-1,3,5-tri zin-2-yl?-amino?carbonyl?amino?sulfonyl?-3-methylbenzoate and application adjuvants.
